text: Hello all. We need to pull blog post tags via API in order to sort them on our website. It seems like our API is not pulling tags at the moment. What could be a problem, is there something very obvious we are missing?
Sorry for not responding to you originally.  What endpoint are you hitting?  Can you share the response you are getting back?  That might help us look into this for you

I think of you are hitting blog endpoint you will get the tags as `topic_ids` list
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/blogv2/get_blog_posts_blog_post_id>

(recently rebranded as tags)

Nvm, I think I miss understood.
If you wanna get the tag lists:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/blog/v3/list-blog-topics>
Thanks a lot Zack, Gonzalo! I will pass this on to our developers and reply about the results.

Hey, checking back in... still needs some tweaking, but I've got a really good gulp build going to aid us in building locally. However, I've hit a bit of a wall trying to get a listing of drag & drop page templates. Maybe just cause it's 3pm on a friday.
But, do you know how I would use the API to get a listing of Drag n drop templates?
I thought the documented v2 CMS Templates API would do it. However, I don't see my drag and drop templates in the data returned.
Ah, the drag and drops are layouts?
I could be wrong, but I think that’s what these are
I haven’t actually used this myself, but I have a memory of someone else asking about this
I hope I’m not leading you down the wrong path on a friday.
